group_1.textRight: It appears that even now, I'm still@dragging that weight around...

group_1.textLeft: Please, tell me more about it.

group_1.textRight: ...Very well. Let me start by telling@you how I got to this point.

group_1.textCenter: My family has led a school of flower@arrangement since the Edo period.
Until my father, then the head, fell ill,
and the school was seized by his lead pupil.
As my father withered away in despair,@he left me these final words:
To free the Kashin school of its false master@and set things right,
that was the duty that my father left to me,@to avenge the Tokiwa family.
Thus I forged a contract with Kyubey, gained the@power to evaluate who my enemies were,
and defeated the enemy of the Tokiwa family...@The Witch, and its mastermind.

group_1.textRight: From the start, the one dictating the rules of@Magical Girls and Witches...was Kyubey.
Then, perhaps it was the Incubator@that was my true enemy...
Once I arrived at that thought, it all@just seemed like a cruel farce.
The power acquired from a wish is merely@a product of being engulfed in those rules.
It's as though I had been dancing in my@enemy's palm from the very beginning...
Seeing the painting of my Witch made me@recall that sensation of helplessness.

group_1.textLeft: And? What now, you just do nothing?

group_1.textRight: I will not give up the fight merely@because the enemy is formidable.
I chose to become a Magical Girl of my own volition.
Even engulfed in these rules, I will break@down all barriers that stand in my way.
No matter how impossible it may seem, so long@as one moves forward without giving up,
the path will continue on@and new possibilities will arise...
I will seize the hope within,
take my vengeance, and restore my family's school.
Even should the flames of conflict continue to burn,
I am resolved to face them ever more,@as the true headmaster.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... So, you dare bind yourself@to a battle infinita,
and burn up your life even more...
Aaah...! This is the most thrilling sensazione!
